'''''Specially-Shaped Saurian...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series X]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Tenebrous Papilla]] while it is replicating the forms of a [[Primo Geovishap]], a [[Jadeplume Terrorshroom]], and the [[Millennial Pearl Seahorse]] respectively.

==Gameplay Notes==
* This requires the player to challenge the boss at least three different times.
* It is not required to defeat the [[Tenebrous Papilla]] in the form order specified in the achievement description. Any form order works, as the term 'respectively' only refers to the forms themselves and not the sequence.
